english.segment2: Blame it on what you've been through. Blame it on what you're into
english.segment3: Blame it on your religions. Blame it on your Politicians
english.segment4: We've been blowing up--we're the issue. it's our condition. We've been blowing up--we're the issue. the detonation?. we're ammunition. we are the fuse and ammunition
english.segment5: I have no generation, show me my motivation. One world, one desperation, one hope and one salvation.
english.segment6: Look what a mess we've made of love. Look what a mess we've made, we've got ourselves to blame. Look what a bomb we've made of love
